availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Josiah Pillsbury (Warren County, Kentucky, attorney and state auditor)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, attorney and state auditor. Maine native. Father of Keith Pillsbury and William Pillsbury. Married to Zerelda Pillsbury. Attorney in Warren County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in 1850. Attorney in Warren County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860. State auditor of Kentucky in 1861.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 118. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 580. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slaves Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 447. Find A Grave, "Josiah Pillsbury (1812-August 31, 1884)," Memorial #116842651, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116842651 (accessed November 8, 2019). KYR-0004-033-0023.
